The G-Zero World

The lack of global leadership is a pressing issue, with the US being the most powerful country but also the most politically divided and economically unequal. China faces challenges in maintaining momentum while enhancing social harmony and stability. The world is shifting towards a technopolar world, where corporations are losing the culture wars.
